ValidationRule.description: Once checked, Possession Done can not be unchecked again.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( !RW_Possession_Done__c, PRIORVALUE(RW_Possession_Done__c), $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_opp == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/ )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Once True, Possession Done can not be changed to False.
